mapper.insert: /** insertWlyCd */ with upsert as ( UPDATE TB_COM_WLY_CD SET LAST_CHPR_ID = #{lastChprId} , LAST_CHG_DTTM = SYSTIMESTAMP , DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE Wly_CD = #{wlyCd} AND DEL_YN = 'Y' returning * ) INSERT INTO TB_COM_WLY_CD ( WlY_CD , DEL_YN , FRST_REGST_ID , FRST_RGSR_DTTM , LAST_CHPR_ID , LAST_CHG_DTTM ) SELECT #{wlyCd} , 'N' , #{frstRegstId} , SYSTIMESTAMP , #{lastChprId} , SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE NOT exists(select * from upsert)
mapper.update: /** deletePostCdLangWly */ UPDATE TB_COM_POST_CD_LANG SET LAST_CHPR_ID = #{lastChprId} , LAST_CHG_DTTM = SYSTIMESTAMP , DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE POST_ID IN ( SELECT POST_ID FROM TB_COM_POST_CD WHERE COMM_ID IN ( SELECT COMM_ID FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD WHERE WLY_CD = '59' ) )
mapper.select:
/** selectWlyCommCdList */
SELECT COMM_ID , WLY_CD , (SELECT COMM_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'FR') AS COMM_NM_FR , (SELECT COMM_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'EN') AS COMM_NM_EN , (SELECT COMM_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'KO') AS COMM_NM_KO , (SELECT COMM_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'AR') AS COMM_NM_AR , (SELECT COMM_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}) AS COMM_NM , (SELECT DAIRA_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'FR') AS DAIRA_NM_FR , (SELECT DAIRA_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'EN') AS DAIRA_NM_EN , (SELECT DAIRA_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'KO') AS DAIRA_NM_KO , (SELECT DAIRA_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = 'AR') AS DAIRA_NM_AR , (SELECT DAIRA_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD_LANG WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND COMM_ID = A.COMM_ID AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}) AS DAIRA_NM FROM TB_COM_COMM_CD A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.WLY_CD = #{wlyCd} ORDER BY COMM_ID
